Class CommonDebugger

jp.co.cam.universal.debug.impl.AbstractDebugger
jp.co.cam.universal.debug.impl.CommonDebugger
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public class CommonDebugger extends AbstractDebugger
[universal](commons)This class is the standard class of log output class.
